text: Celso Luiz Nunes Amorim (born June 3, 1942) is a Brazilian politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Relations from July 20, 1993 to December 31, 1994 under President Itamar Franco and again from January 1, 2003 to December 31, 2010 under President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva. He was Minister of Defence from August 4, 2011 to December 31, 2014 under President Dilma Rousseff.Brazil will not 'sell' Amazon GulfnewsBrazil's Defense Minister Is Ousted WSJ. Retrieved on 2011-08-04. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from São Paulo (state) Category:People from Santos, São Paulo Category:Ambassadors
title: Celso Amorim
